title: The game has crashed Please try to reconnect to the game?????
body: i guess since all the other forums are old.... any fixes.

replies.body: This happens to me all the time too. Sometimes my league completely freezes after champ select when the timer hits 0. Or when im in game typically around the 10 min mark, i get a bad lag spike and i get the "connecting to server"when that happens i check my client and it says you have been "disconnected from chat, you can manually reconnect". Is there anything i can do
Same here, I get in game as soon as i click some where it jumps to 500 ping and crashes, reconnect and same thing can anyone help ?

The game needs a constant connection to communicate information about what's going on, otherwise you might see delays or be disconnected from the game entirely.  I recommend going over the steps in our[ connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tune up your connection and fix this up.  Hope that helps!

I'd like to help with this but need some better information.  Crash is a loose term, and I need a better understanding of what you mean by that.  For example, what are you seeing when you see this crash?  Are there any error messages, and what does it say exactly?  When does it happen?  Anything can help!
after champion select were bout to load in and then is says 'The game has crashed. Please try to reconnect to the game' and the sends error report pops up.

Thanks for the follow up.  It sounds like something is failing to render the game properly, which could be due to a few reasons like outdated drivers or corrupt game files.  Go over the troubleshoot steps in our [game crash ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes)guide, which should get you fixed up.  Let me know if you run into any issues!
Been having this issue since the update. Nothing from Riot yet. Client works fine, but the moment I load into a game it bugsplats over and over, tried literally everything and no solution.
